name: In This House
description:
In This House is a short interactive story about a world-renowned chef, recalling her life through her memories,
and a dark family secret.

Designers: Noa Reim Givon, Dinara Abdullina

Developers: Mira Finkelstein, Dor Gidony

Made as part of Game Jam course in Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design.
